name: Epic Pilot 69: Pilot Boogaloo
description:
In this epic single-player arcade style game, your objective is to fight through waves of enemies until you defeat the boss, if you can.

Dodge enemy rounds and destroy enemy aircraft.

Press the SPACE BAR to fire at enemy aircrafts.

Use the ARROW KEYS to navigate your aircraft.

Developed by Angel Badillo.

Graphic Design by Aracely Ibarra and Jack Dodd.

Concept by Jack Dodd.
